Detailed Description

Birational Map and utilities from MOL Paper.

Authors:
Graham Enos & Dr. Yuliang Zheng
This file contains the C++ implementation of the birational map and assorted utility functions given in Moloney, O'Mahony, & Laurent's paper, available here: http://eprint.iacr.org/2010/208
